query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZBST401 SET BS401_GBN = #GBN#, BS401_USE = #USE#, BS401_PST = '10', BS401_DEV = #DEV#, BS401_GNM = #GNM#, BS401_CST = #CST#, BS401_SPT = #SPT#, BS401_PID = #PID#, BS401_TEL = #TEL#, BS401_ZIP = #ZIP#, BS401_AD1 = #AD1#, BS401_AD2 = #AD2#, BS401_AGB = #AGB#, BS401_QTY = #QTY#, BS401_ABL = #ABL#, BS401_RIV = #RI1#, BS401_RI2 = #RI2#, BS401_RI3 = #RI3#, BS401_RI4 = #RI4#, BS401_RI5 = #RI5#, BS401_RI6 = #RI6#, BS401_YDT = #YDT#, BS401_IDT = #IDT#, BS401_OAM = CAST(#OAM# AS DECIMAL(16,0)), BS401_RAT = CAST(#RAT# AS DECIMAL(10,1)), BS401_EAM = CAST(#GAM# AS DECIMAL(16,0)), BS401_RMK = #RMK#, BS401_ACB = #ACB#, BS401_T01 = #T01#, BS401_T02 = #T02#, BS401_T03 = #T03#, BS401_T04 = #T04#, BS401_T05 = #T05#, BS401_T06 = #T06#, BS401_T07 = #T07#, BS401_T08 = #T08#, BS401_T09 = #T09#, BS401_T10 = #T10#, BS401_P01 = #P01#, BS401_P02 = #P02#, BS401_P03 = #P03#, BS401_P04 = #P04#, BS401_C01 = #C01#, BS401_C02 = #C02#, BS401_C03 = #C03#, BS401_C04 = #C04#, BS401_G01 = #G01#, BS401_G02 = #G02#, BS401_G03 = #G03#, BS401_G04 = #G04#, BS401_UDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), BS401_UID = #G_USER_ID#, BS401_DEL = 'N', BS401_SND = 'N' WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS401_DEP = #DEP# AND BS401_RDT = #RDT# AND BS401_SEQ = #SEQ# AND BS401_SIR = #SIR#
